content.rendered: [vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Processes already available data and generate evidences based on national research priorities using rigorous scientific methods through research collaboration platform with local and international agencies and build evidence synthesis and dissemination capacity in the country.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
